search.title: What can I get from 4-star troops draws?
Lucky Time probability from 4-star troops draws

embeds.title: 4-star troops draws
embeds.description: The best way to obtain Epic and Legendary troops is through 4-star troops draws.

fields.name: Normal 4-star troops draws
value<text>: In normal 4-star troops draws, the player can get:

The pool includes all __Common__ troops, all __Rare__ troops (except Inquisitor), and the following __Epic__ troops: Brawlers, Peltasts, Taurus Witcher, Voodoo Dolls, Pumpkin Guard, Orc Hunters, Undead Warrior, and Shadow Ninja

fields.name: Lucky Time draws
value<text>: In Lucky Time, the player can get:
Lucky Time occurs approximately once every 2.7 normal draws
